subject: Joey Buttafuoco & Amy Fisher Together Again?
body:
Tonight On CNN Email







May 23, 2007








 





9 p.m. ET


 

Larry King Live:  Buttafuoco Saga Continues


Joey Buttafuoco and Amy Fisher back together? Now Joey's ex-wife responds. More than 15 years after Amy shot her in the face -- Mary Jo speaks out. Watch tonight, 9 ET.




























Related:• E-Mail your questions to Mary Jo Buttafuoco







 
 





 




6:00 a.m. ET


 

American Morning


Rising gas prices, extreme weather, even the price of corn are inflating your grocery bills. Find out why the high cost of living just got higher.










 





7:00 p.m. ET


 

The Situation Room


Political pressure: The Democrats drop a troop withdraw deadline from the Iraq funding bill. Will they pay a political price in '08?







8:00 p.m. ET


 

Paula Zahn NOW


Is the Pentagon turning our troops into gambling addicts? See the shocking truth about overseas military casinos in a special report.







9:00 p.m. ET


 

Larry King Live


Joey Buttafuoco and Amy Fisher back together? Now Joey's ex wife responds. Nearly fifteen years to the day after Amy shot her in the face, Mary Jo speaks out.







10:00 p.m. ET


 

Anderson Cooper 360


See first-hand the devastating effects of climate change on our environment and wildlife. Exclusive access to billionaire Richard Branson's tour of the Canadian Arctic in a special report, "Planet in Peril."
